alert.note: Alert for Glenn; Shasta; Tehama (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 19 at 12:06AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Western Tehama County in northern California... Western Glenn County in central California... Southwestern Shasta County in northern California... * Until noon PDT Monday. * At 1200 AM PDT, emergency management reported heavy rain causing minor flooding in along the Coast Range in western Glenn County. 2 to 4 inches of rain have fallen since late Sunday afternoon. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... western portions of the Sacramento Valley, west of Interstate 5. The August Complex burn scar over the Coast Range will see slides and debris flows.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Move away from recently burned areas. Flooding of creeks, roads and normally dry arroyos is likely. The heavy rains will likely trigger rockslides, mudslides and debris flows in steep terrain, especially in and around these areas.
